value.name: Chatham County DFACS to grow Child Protective Services by 50%
value.description: The national average for the 42 states with reportable data is 6.7 cases a month per employee. Chatham County DFACS Director Shawn Brown says his department works daily to evaluate tips, and they stick to hard deadlines to respond to potential cases.

value.name: Case over against man cleared in so-called shaken baby case
value.description: BATTLE CREEK, Mich. (AP) — A prosecutor will not seek a second trial against a Battle Creek man who successfully challenged his manslaughter conviction in the death of his 5-month-old son.
